__e: Let them go Sir, we'll fall into trouble.
There are friendlies on board. Look at the dialing device.
I want you to ignore my friends as they come by.
You do your piece with them, and you let them go.
Long as you know where to find them, let them go.
I'll do anything you want. But please let them leave.
Leave them alone, or I shall send for the police!
I'm here. Leave them alone. They don't have anything to do with it.
Leave them alone, they've done nothing to you!
Long as no harm's done, just give them a little room.
Let them make breakfast and come back to bed.
When the rest of their army arrive, let them bring the fight to us.
Let them line up at this side.
Let them meet, if that's how they want to spend their leisure time.
What if I just toss it up in the air and let them fight it out among themselves?
Good! Then open the gate, and let them in!
Let them get deeper into the belly of the beast. And then we take them two at a time.
And, when they come, let them in. You can open every door.
